tool_description: This API will give random facts about cricket.
name: cricket-facts-api
title: cricket-facts-api

api_list.name: Get Random facts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-facts-api.p.rapidapi.com/facts/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-facts-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-facts-api.p.rapidapi.com/facts/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-facts-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
